A beautiful Greystone on an extra wide 31 ft wide lot perfectly situated on a quiet tree lined block in Lakevew. This 4,600 sq ft home is completely new inside from top to bottom as well as a new rear addition. The beautiful exterior has been preserved while brand new oversized windows have been added capturing amazing light all day. The wide lot allows for an exceptional floorplan: 4 beds/3baths and laundry all on the 2nd fl. The main level features an extra wide living/dining/family room and oversized chef's kitchen complete with the Subzero and Wolf appliances. This home also features a 30ft by 22 ft landscaped backyard and 2.5 car garage. Lastly, this home sits withing the highly coveted Blaine School District. Welcome to your new home!

Views of Forever! Southeast facing 2 bedroom, 2 bath 1,150 sq ft corner unit has unobstructed views of the lake, spectacular sight line to the city, and everything in between. Walk into a foyer with coat closet and separate storage closet. The kitchen has not only been updated, but expanded and opened up. Large breakfast bar divides the kitchen from the living room. Separate dining area overlooks Lake Michigan. The living room is covered in ceramic tile and perched high over Lake Shore. Both bedrooms have oak hardwood floors and nice closet space. Master bathroom is all granite with separate shower. Deeded parking spot is included in the price. Park Place Tower has all the most sought after amenities.

response.homeDescription: Exceptionally maintained home in an all brick building, on a beautiful tree lined street in Graceland West. Gut rehabbed in 2004, with outstanding attention to detail in this extra wide, top floor unit. Opened concept kitchen, living & dining rooms, complete with custom mill work and in-laid details on the Brazilian cherry floors. Large windows for natural light, and a gas fireplace completes the living room. The large kitchen features granite counter tops, 42" cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a long breakfast bar. The wide hall with exposed brick wall leads to the full hall bath, and two large bedrooms at the rear of the home. The master en-suit features a jacuzzi tub with separate steam shower, and dual sinks in the vanity. Stained glass accent windows complete the bedroom. In-unit washer and dryer, along with one parking space and storage locker are included are included in the purchase price. 1/2 block from Southport, and across the street from Neighborhood Park.

Extra large 1 bed/1 bath in Lakeview. Upgraded finishes - hardwood floors, oak buffet in dining room, gas fireplace, and in-unit washer/dryer. Kitchen has granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances, and a large pantry. Jacuzzi tub in bathroom. Master bedroom has his/her closets! Deck off of kitchen perfect for grilling. Located across from the park and lake in Chicagos Buena Park Historic District, Imperial Towers is a pair of full-amenity high-rise condominiums. The buildings offer picturesque lake, park, and Navy Pier views that are protected by the districts historic neighborhood designation.Residents at the Towers enjoy countless services and amenities. The attentive staff include 24-hour door staff and security, an onsite manager and engineer, and a receiving room. There is an outdoor pool with sundeck, a party room, a fitness room, a laundry room, a dry cleaners, a full grocer, and a new restaurant with bar. The building also offers residents assigned storage, bike storage, and leased garage parking.Separate fees are required for the use of the pool and bike room. Leased parking is $240/month per space.Countless neighborhood amenities are nearby, including Montrose Harbor and Beach, the 18-mile Lakefront Trail, and a 9-hole golf course as well as cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping. The Jewel-Osco and the new Wilson Yard Target are both conveniently close.The 146 express bus stops right in front of the building, offering fast travel to downtown. It is walking distance to the Wilson Red Line L station, and there is easy access to nearby Lake Shore Drive.This renovated one bedroom, one bath condo offers unobstructed views from its high-floor perch. The living space and bedroom face south, overlooking the park, lake, harbor, and golf course with the downtown skyline and Navy Pier in the distance. Updates include new paint, light fixtures, carpet, windows, bath, and electric service.An entry foyer with coat closet leads into the home. The main living space consists of a large combination living/dining room. The new kitchen features shaker-style cabinets, a full-height mosaic tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances.The bedroom has a wall of closets, and the bath has a combination tub/shower. Two additional closets are located in the hall.The home is equipped with radiator heating and in-wall air conditioning units in the living area and bedroom. The building does not permit in-unit laundry equipment.If you think this home might be right for you, please call or email us. We are standing by to answer your questions or schedule a time for you to walk through with a member of our team.
